name: Lieve Hugo
description: '''Julius Theodoor Hugo Uiterloo''' (December 13, 1934 â€“ November 15, 1975), better known by his stage-name '''Lieve Hugo''' and his nickname '''Iko''', was a [[Suriname]]se singer. He was one of the pioneers of the [[kaseko]]-genre; hence his other nickname ''King of Kaseko''.
